name: Power of Attorney
shortDescription: A power of attorney (POA) is a written authorization letter given to another person or organization to manage a person’s financial, medical and private affairs.
description: A power of attorney (POA) is a written authorization letter given to another person or organization to manage a person’s financial, medical and private affairs. The person authorizing the other to act is the principal and the person authorized to act is an agent.

description: First Draft delivered within 3 working days

description: Document review and consult with the Lawyer
Redline version delivered within 8 working hours

howWeWork.heading: How to get a Power of Attorney agreement drafted

content.title: Schedule Call with the Lawyer
content.description: Schedule Call and discuss with the Lawyer your Document drafting requirements

content.title: Get your Agreement Draft
content.description: Lawyer will deliver customized draft of the Document as per your requirement

content.title: Dedicated Lawyer Available
content.description: 60 Minutes of Talk time with the Lawyer for discussing requirements and changes in the draft

content.title: First Draft within 3 Days
content.description: First draft of the Document will be delivered within a maximum of 3 working days

content.title: Finalize Document
content.description: 2/3 Iterations per Document allowed to incorporate your suggestions/changes

content.title: Details of principal
content.description: The POA prescribes the details of the person authorizing the other to act or principal. It includes information like name, address, age and occupation.

content.title: Details of the agent
content.description: The POA prescribes the details of the agent. It includes information like name, address, age and occupation of the agent.

content.title: Date and place of execution
content.description: The document states the date and place of execution along with the date on which the POA will come into force.

content.title: Reason for granting POA
content.description: The principal has to clearly state the reason for granting the POA. The reason should be legally valid and should not contain any act against law.

content.title: Termination
content.description: In case of a time limited POA, the principal shall prescribe the time period until which the POA will remain valid and in force.

content.title: Powers and Restrictions
content.description: The POA outlines all the powers granted to the agent. The POA clearly mentions all the acts to be done or not be done by the agent. It also includes certain specific acts.
A power of attorney includes all of the powers required to do effective asset protection planning.
Provides you the opportunity to choose who will make decisions for you.

productFeature.description: Senior Corporate Lawyers with 15+ years of experience

whyChooseUs.title: Reliable & Trusted
whyChooseUs.description: Over 3,000 five star reviews from our customers

whyChooseUs.title: Fast & Easy

whyChooseUs.title: Secure & Confidential
whyChooseUs.description: Documents and information are always kept private. Information shared with the lawyer are 100% confidential.

faqs.question: What kinds of legal authority can be granted with a Power of Attorney?
faqs.answer:
1) Buy, sell, maintain, pay taxes on and mortgage real estate. 
2) Manage your property and Conduct your banking transactions.
3) Invest, or not invest, your money in stocks, bonds and mutual funds.
Make legal claims and conduct litigation.

faqs.question: What is a durable POA?
faqs.answer: A durable power of attorney stays effective until the principle dies or until they act to revoke the power they've granted to their agent.

faqs.question: I have a POA; how can I get it reviewed by a Lawyer?
faqs.answer: ezyLegal can help you get your POA reviewed and provide you with the right legal guidance. You can upload your document and schedule your Consultation with an ezyLegal Lawyer.

faqs.question: What is the process of getting the Agreement drafted from ezyLegal?
faqs.answer: ezyLegal offers Standard and Customized Document drafts. If you chose the customized Document option, your call will be scheduled with a Lawyer to whom you can explain your specific requirements. The first draft will be delivered within 2 working days and then you would be allowed 2-3 iterations to make changes in the draft.

faqs.question: How will the Document be delivered to me?
faqs.answer: The Document when ready will be available on the ezyLegal website (www.ezylegal.in) in your secured Account. You will be notified on email and WhatsApp whenever a new version of the Document is uploaded. You can Log-in and View or Download the document.  Copy of the documents delivered by ezyLegal will always be available in your ezyLegal account forever.
